tier.item: (3) 'O le af i af i o le Aso Sâ e tâ mai ai le lau-niu,
evening S unda y cut coconut-leaf
PRES ART POSS ART GENR DIR ANAPH ART
'ua l al aga ai tama'i ato e l ua,
e s auni uni mo le â'oga i le taeao.

iron also clothes POSS ART:DIM:PL children
`On Sunday evening (a boy) cuts a coconut leaf,
weaves two little baskets from it to be prepared for the school in the morning.
(A girl) also irons the clothes of the little children.' (Aiavao 1987:60).

hot hot and cold. extraordinary wind and cold

to which Andy will go. He said to me that he will only come back in February.)
